## BaseClientOptions.logMsg property

Whether to log \[SendMsg\] and \[RecvMsg\] by the `logger`<!-- -->. NOTICE: if `logger` is `undefined`<!-- -->, no log would be printed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
logMsg: boolean;
```
